name: Create project build configuration as generated user
description: Super-admin creates new user, new user creates project, project build configuration

steps.name: Create test user with fake user-data, generate fake project data

Sending POST request to http://localhost:8111/app/rest/users with data: {'username': 'image', 'password': 'da5Li6Bk6Es', 'email': 'melvin79@example.com', 'roles': {'role': [{'roleId': 'PROJECT_ADMIN', 'scope': 'g'}]}}, expected_status: 200
Auth user with creds: "('image', 'da5Li6Bk6Es')" and get csrf token
Sending GET request to http://localhost:8111/authenticationTest.html?csrf with data: None, expected_status: 200
Send request to create new project

Sending POST request to http://localhost:8111/app/rest/projects with data: {'parentProject': {'locator': '_Root'}, 'name': 'pay', 'id': 'ubVn1o3d2OO', 'copyAllAssociatedSettings': True}, expected_status: 200
Check if generated fake project ID: "ubVn1o3d2OO" equals ID from respond "ubVn1o3d2OO"
Create build conf for created project ubVn1o3d2OO

Create build configuration with data: {'id': 'tuvKQQEpBgF', 'name': 'any', 'project': {'id': 'ubVn1o3d2OO'}, 'steps': {'name': 'cost', 'type': 'people', 'properties': {'property': [{'name': 'script.content', 'value': "echo 'Hello World!'"}, {'name': 'teamcity.step.mode', 'value': 'default'}, {'name': 'use.custom.script', 'value': 'true'}]}}}

Sending POST request to http://localhost:8111/app/rest/buildTypes with data: {'id': 'tuvKQQEpBgF', 'name': 'any', 'project': {'id': 'ubVn1o3d2OO'}, 'steps': {'name': 'cost', 'type': 'people', 'properties': {'property': [{'name': 'script.content', 'value': "echo 'Hello World!'"}, {'name': 'teamcity.step.mode', 'value': 'default'}, {'name': 'use.custom.script', 'value': 'true'}]}}}, expected_status: 200
Check if created fake build conf ID: "tuvKQQEpBgF" equals ID from respond "tuvKQQEpBgF"

labels.name: story
labels.value: As project admin create build configuration
